Interface","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"BalanceError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the balanceOf function is not successful and does not return data"}],"CalibrationError(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the parameters of a new pool are invalid, causing initial reserves to be 0"}],"DeltaInError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the deltaIn parameter is 0"}],"DeltaOutError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the deltaOut parameter is 0"}],"GammaError(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when gamma, equal to 1 - fee %, is outside its bounds: 9_000 <= gamma <= 10_000; 1_000 = 10% fee"}],"InvariantError(int128,int128)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the invariant check fails"}],"LockedError()":[{"notice":"Thrown on attempted re-entrancy on a function with when a pool with computed poolId already exists"}],"PoolExpiredError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when calling an expired pool, where block.timestamp > maturity, + BUFFER if swap"}],"SigmaError(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when sigma is outside the range of acceptable values, 1 <= sigma <= 1e7 with 4 precision"}],"StrikeError(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when strike is not valid, i.e. equal to 0 or greater than 2^128"}],"UninitializedError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the pool with poolId has not been created"}],"ZeroDeltasError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the quote or base amount is 0"}],"ZeroLiquidityError()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the liquidity parameter is 0"}],"baseBalanceError(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the expected base balance is less than quotePerLp is outside the range of acceptable values, 0 < quotePerLp <= 1equoteDecimals"}]},"events":{"Allocate(address,address,bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Adds liquidity of quote and quote and base tokens to a specified `poolId`"},"Swap(address,address,bytes32,bool,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Swaps between `quote` and `base` assets"},"UpdateLastTimestamp(bytes32)":{"notice":"Updates the time until expiry of the pool with `poolId`"},"Withdraw(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Removes base and/or quote from a returns._0: Amount of seconds after pool expiry which allows swaps, no swaps after buffer
Amount of liquidity burned on `create()` calls
Precision units to scale to when doing token related calculations

params.data: Arbitrary data that is passed to the allocateCallback function
params.delBase: Amount of base tokens to add
params.delQuote: Amount of quote tokens to add
params.fromMargin: Whether the `msg.sender` pays with their margin balance, or must send tokens
params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma
params.recipient: Address to give the allocated liquidity to

returns._0: base token address, a more accurate name is the quote token

params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of the engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma

returns.gamma: Multiplied against swap in amounts to apply fee, equal to 1 - fee % but units are in basis points, valid for (9_000, 10_000)
returns.lastTimestamp: Last timestamp used to calculate time until expiry, aka "tau"
returns.maturity: Timestamp which starts the BUFFER countdown until swaps will cease, in seconds, valid for (block.timestamp, 2^32-1]
returns.sigma: AKA Implied Volatility in basis points, determines the price impact of swaps, valid for (1, 10_000_000)
returns.strike: Marginal price of the pool's quote token at maturity, with the same decimals as the base token, valid [0, 2^128-1]

params.data: Arbitrary data that is passed to the createCallback function
params.delLiquidity: Amount of liquidity units to allocate to the curve, wei value with 18 decimals of precision
params.gamma: Multiplied against swap in amounts to apply fee, equal to 1 - fee % but units are in basis points, valid for (9_000, 10_000)
params.maturity: Timestamp which starts the BUFFER countdown until swaps will cease, in seconds, valid for (block.timestamp, 2^32-1]
params.quotePerLp: quote reserve per liq. with quote decimals, = 1 - N(d1), d1 = (ln(S/K)+(r*^2/2))/, valid for [0, 1e^(quote token decimals))
params.sigma: AKA Implied Volatility in basis points, determines the price impact of swaps, valid for (1, 10_000_000)
params.strike: Marginal price of the pool's quote token at maturity, with the same decimals as the base token, valid [0, 2^128-1]

returns.delBase: Total amount of base tokens provided to reserves
returns.delQuote: Total amount of quote tokens provided to reserves
returns.poolId: Keccak256 hash of engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma

params.data: Arbitrary data that is passed to the depositCallback function
params.delBase: Amount of base tokens to deposit
params.delQuote: Amount of quote tokens to deposit
params.recipient: Recipient margin account of the deposited tokens

params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of the engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma

returns.invariant: Signed fixed point 64.64 number, invariant of `poolId`

params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of the engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma
Keccak256 hash of engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma

returns.delBase: Amount of base tokens received from removed liquidity
returns.delQuote: Amount of quote tokens received from removed liquidity

params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of the engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma

returns.blockTimestamp: Timestamp when the cumulative reserve values were last updated
returns.cumulativeBase: Cumulative sum of base token reserves of the previous update
returns.cumulativeLiquidity: Cumulative sum of total supply of liquidity of the previous update
returns.cumulativeQuote: Cumulative sum of quote token reserves of the previous update
returns.liquidity: Total supply of liquidity for the curve
returns.reserveBase: base token balance in the reserve
returns.reserveQuote: quote token balance in the reserve

returns._0: Multiplier to scale amounts to/from, equal to 10^(18 - baseDecimals)
Multiplier to scale amounts to/from, equal to 10^(18 - quoteDecimals)

params.data: Arbitrary data that is passed to the swapCallback function
params.deltaIn: Amount of tokens to swap in
params.deltaOut: Amount of tokens to swap out
params.fromMargin: Whether the `msg.sender` uses their margin balance, or must send tokens
params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma
params.quoteForBase: If true, swap quote to base, else swap base to quote
params.recipient: Address that receives output token `deltaOut` amount
params.toMargin: Whether the `deltaOut` amount is transferred or deposited into margin

params.poolId: Keccak256 hash of engine address, strike, sigma, maturity, and gamma

returns.lastTimestamp: Timestamp loaded into the state of the pool's Calibration.lastTimestamp

params.delBase: Amount of base tokens to withdraw
params.delQuote: Amount of quote tokens to withdraw
params.recipient: Address that tokens are transferred to

allocate(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Allocates quote and base tokens to a specific curve with `poolId`

create(uint128,uint32,uint32,uint32,uint.notice: Initializes a curve with parameters in the `calibrations` storage mapping in the Engine

deposit(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Adds quote and/or base tokens to a `recipient`'s internal balance account

invariantOf(bytes32).notice: Fetches the current invariant, notation is usually `k`, based on quote and base token reserves of pool with `poolId`

liquidity(address,bytes32).notice: Fetches position liquidity an account address and poolId

remove(bytes32,uint256).notice: Unallocates quote and base tokens from a specific curve with `poolId`

reserves(bytes32).notice: Fetches the global reserve state for a pool with `poolId`

updateLastTimestamp(bytes32).notice: Updates the time until expiry of the pool by setting its last timestamp value

withdraw(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Removes quote and/or base tokens from a `msg.sender`'s internal balance account
